attributes.action: Remove the North Wales Police chief from office as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: North Wales Police Chief Richard Brunstrom, has gone too far this time in showing pictures of deceased persons without the express permission of the persons Next of Kin.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove the North Wales Police chief from office as soon as possible."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13180.asp

Prime Minister's Office
